text:
Alex Rodriguez just launched the first of several "super gyms" in the Miami area, and he can't wait for J.Lo to join him in a sweat sesh.

The couple, known for their respective super-toned bodies, already love to work out together, lifting weights and going on bike rides, Rodriguez told PEOPLE at the gym's opening. They both also enjoy a mix of Pilates classes (Lopez works out with Tracy Anderson when she's in LA) and strength-training sessions.

While Lopez was out of town working for the opening of A-Rod's UFC gym, located in Kendall near where he grew up, the former baseball player was eager to sing her praises anyway.

"I can't wait to bring her here to my new gym," the former baseball player and sports commentator told PEOPLE. "She is a great jock, a former track star in school, and I enjoy working out with her."

He bought the two-level gym back in March, and has since updated it to include a kids center, lifestyle shop and cafe, according to Miami.com. The gym focuses on mixed martial arts equipment, and offers kickboxing, boxing conditioning, and jiu jitsu classes.

Rodriguez, who has already opened several successful gyms in Mexico over the last decade, plans to open more UFC-branded gyms throughout South Florida in the coming year.

title: A-Rod Spills All The Details On His Couples Workouts With Jennifer Lopez
